extendedInfo.description: The Dijit Universal Remote app turns your Android phone or tablet into a personalized remote control with TV channel listings and show guide.NOTE 1: Remote control features only work on compatible Android devices (including DROID XYBOARD and Motorola Xoom 2) or when paired with the Griffin Beacon for Android (It is not compatible with the Griffin Beacon for iOS), or over WiFi with Roku Media Players.NOTE 2: TV Channel Listings only available in the US and Canada.With Dijit's remote control features, you can finally clean up your coffee table and put your extra remotes away in a drawer somewhere. Now your phone (or tablet) is your remote. At last your whole family (and even guests) will be able to figure out how to control all the different devices and inputs you have in the living room!Dijit gives you a perfectly customizable remote control interface, where you decide exactly which buttons appear when you want them to. No more squinting at 73 identically shaped buttons on your remote, just the ones you want and need. Using Dijit is incredibly simple. Add each device you want to control with just a few taps using our included device library.In addition to the remote control, the Dijit Guide delivers a customized electronic program guide (EPG) for your personal TV channel lineup. Simply identify your cable/satellite provider, and Dijit will find all your listings. From there you can quickly prune your guide to just show the channels and shows you like to watch, and hide all the rest.Features: â¨â¢ Built-in device code (over 200,000 TVs, DVD players, Blu-Rays, DVRs, Set-Tops, and more) library for instant programming â¢ Integrated learning feature for advanced or custom controlsâ¢ Fully customizable button layoutâ¢ Support for multiple systems in different rooms or homes â¢ WiFi support for Roku owners to control their Roku Media Players with their Android devices.â¢ Program guide that works with every channel provider in the US and CanadaFor more information about the Griffin Beacon: http://www.griffintechnology.com/beacon.

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: Update...Now it saves your remotes.  Thanks for the fix!!   Setup is easy, however, it will not save your data.  When you restart it, your remotes are gone.  You have to reenter data every time.  Good app but setting up every time is NOT.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks bad!
reviews.comment: This crap came pre installed on my Xyboard.  All I ever get is IR error messages.  If I could uninstall this awful app I would.
reviews.author: Ben Liskovec

reviews.title: Needs Update
reviews.comment: The app is useable but it could really be improved in the UI department and add in some performance improvements especially with android 4.2 all ready out and no updates for over 15 months.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Remote
reviews.comment: Works great on Motorola xyboard. This app requires you have infrared, so the people rating it low on their galaxy tabs aren\'t reading the description. This app is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Dev pretty much told me they dont care....
reviews.comment: So I asked if there was any progress made on this app since its been a few months and they stated that they dont care about the Android app and for me to get an iPad... ah Im not going to go buy another beacon and a 400+ pos iPad. So yea they are giving the android community the finger.... ~_~
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FAIL
reviews.comment: This was just a waste of my time. It did not work on any of my devices. This App sucks Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea if it worked
reviews.comment: The guide section works great however the universal remote not so much. I\'m using a Samsung Galaxy S3 amd tried it with both ICS and JB on 4 different TVs and none of them worked with remote.  It did not work on my son\'s Galaxy S2 either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not save settings
reviews.comment: It works great but if i ever exit it loses all setup on the remotes which kind of makes it useless. Please fix. It is not saving setup of remotes. Motorola Xyboard
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unsatisfied
reviews.comment: It has my tv brand listed but when I connect to it nothing happends. Then it says it \"found a remote for me\" and it doesn\'t do anything. I\'m uninstalling it. A waste if my time.
reviews.author: Nick Pristash

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: It does what it\'s supposed to do, however it does not remember my devices. As soon as you exit the app you have to recalibrate each device. Please fix, too much of a hassle!!!
reviews.author: Sarah Milam

reviews.title: This would be a great TV guide app
reviews.comment: Just remove the device column and make the info column smaller and add a swipe feature to the guide column. :)  4 stars for being a great TV guide app. I don\'t need the universal remote feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad..
reviews.comment: I dont even get to know how it works...... They show a screen saying u can make this work by following a few steps... But there are no steps
reviews.author: Eshaan Arora

reviews.title: Forgets devices every time it closes
reviews.comment: Why do i have to re enter every device each time it closes. Fix the bug and ill be sure to re rate. Pre installed on a droid xyboard10.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This app and ir blaster work wonderfully for my receiver, tv, and blu-ray player. Using Droid Razr and Galaxy SIII. It is very customizable and does everything with the push of one button. I would have paid a lot more for it.
reviews.author: Parker M

reviews.title: Did not work
reviews.comment: %subj% @ Sony Xperia ZL The app looks better than stock Sony remote application. Great button customization idea
reviews.author: Andrey Lutov

reviews.title: not even running
reviews.comment: Although Google Play lists this app as compatible with my phone, i cannot make it run. It keeps getting stuck on the welcome screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works ok
reviews.comment: Great app, needs work...  needs to be able to save remotes upon exit...  saw a couple posts about ignoring the android market, hope it is not true since androids hold 65% of the markets according to wikipedia\'s 2012 data up from about 25% in 09`
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good except
reviews.comment: Found my old tvs just fine but does not save devices after exit. Needs update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps forgetting room settings!
reviews.comment: On my xoom 2, when the app is opened it has forgotten all rooms and settings! Its terrible!
reviews.author: A Google User
